message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I believe a starting price of $950,000 is fair.  What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $820,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $820,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down a bit to $900,000. This is my final offer.
Thank you for your response, Alice. After considering the value of the product, I am willing to offer $870,000. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
